d6176153-a545-424b-a300-8d0ae41ab5af.description: This badges recognises that the holder was elected and served at least two three-year terms on the CEdMA Europe board, during which time they contributed significantly to the advancement of the organisation.

badge_template_activities.title: Management of a technical training group
Contributor to CEdMA Europe conferences and workshops
Forming the development of the CEdMA Europe organisation for at least six years

59e18d29-fc55-400a-9876-406ec49f78f6.description: This badges recognizes that the holder was elected and served at least three two-year terms on the CEdMA US board, during which time they contributed significantly to the advancement of the organization.

badge_template_activities.title: Management of a technical training group

Forming the development of the CEdMA organisation for at least six years

2419e377-1a8e-4ade-9163-be3c842ba4dc.description: This badges recognizes that the holder chaired a minimum of 20 SIG meetings during which time they developed a program to meet the interests and requirements of SIG members.
2419e377-1a8e-4ade-9163-be3c842ba4dc.name: Emeritus CEdMA US Special Interest Group (SIG) Chair

badge_template_activities.title: Leadership of a discipline within Technical Training Management
Leading and presenting/facilitating at 25 or more SIG meetings

65fd9e17-fc26-4ed0-b7a7-feea39880bd5.description: The CEdMA Europe Innovation Award recognizes a CEdMA Europe member company that demonstrates excellence in the innovation its organization made, as well as its ability to clearly demonstrate that innovation.
65fd9e17-fc26-4ed0-b7a7-feea39880bd5.name: CEdMA Europe Innovation Award 2021

badge_template_activities.title: One of the toughest questions a training organization faces is what innovation its efforts contain. Sure, you can create a lot of materials, train a lot of people, but what about that is innovative? Was it definitely the training organization that made the difference, rather than numerous other factors? And did the innovation justify the investment that was made by the organization?

skills.name: Demonstrate innovation of a product or service

a18af270-fac5-4051-ac4d-dc99b816aacb.description: The CEdMA Europe Impact Award recognizes a CEdMA Europe member company that demonstrates excellence both in the impact it and its organization have, as well as its ability to clearly prove that impact.
a18af270-fac5-4051-ac4d-dc99b816aacb.name: CEdMA Europe Impact Award 2017

d0ee0905-8483-4ca6-b605-c972083c8aee.description: Earners of this badge will be able to describe the following areas of Technical Training Management - Technical Training Organisation, Strategy & Business Execution, Training Product Management, Business Development, Marketing Management, Revenue Generation, Offerings & Modalities, Certification, Governance & Metrics, Financials, Staff Management & Development
